!Abyssal Celebrant Kartia: Oh, you have recovered the scroll and the tablet. Thank you so much. Now I can start the translation. This sheepskin scroll is *Kaisha's Revelation*. And this clay tablet was recorded by Mystics in the Elmoreden age. It lists the kingdom's characters alongside the characters used by the giants, and is a key in translating the revelation. It's surprising that Tetrarch Thifiell even got his hands on this. All right! The translation is complete. Please take it. Go and deliver it to *Tetrarch Thifiell* at once. I must go now and create a copy of the original revelation.
